q: And so was born ''the special comment'''-- his first one coming in August 2006, rebutting a speech that then-Defense Donald Rumsfeld had delivered to the American Legion. Said Keith Olbermann that night: The confusion we-- as its citizens-- must now address, is stark and forbidding. But variations of it have faced our forefathers, when men like Nixon and McCarthy and Curtis LeMay have darkened our skies and obscured our flag. Bloomberg News reported Thursday that the bonuses would average$ 10,000 for 10,755 salaried workers, but some who aren't covered by government pay restrictions could get up to half their salary. Details regarding salaried performance awards are considered confidential employment records, Ranieri said. Sergio Marchionne has said the workers deserve bonuses even though the company lost money because of work they did in revamping or redesigning 16 models since the 2009 bankruptcy. We have more than one explosion- we have multiple points of scorching heat that are fuelling a blazing fire around us. ''There is intense heat coming from our competitors, more rapidly than we ever expected. While competitors poured flames on our market share, what happened at Nokia? We fell behind, we missed big trends, and we lost time. after a shot-clock violation on Philadelphia with 4.9 seconds left. Sarunas Jasikevicius threw an inbound pass to Paul George , who went around a stumbling Kyle Korver to make an uncontested shot. ''I was 0-for-infinity,'' Paul George said. I just wanted to make a shot. We knew they'd switch. I went backdoor and got to the basket. My teammates showed confidence in me to give me the ball. It seemed like I hadn't made a shot all game. Paul George missed 15 of his first 19 shots before the easy layup.
